thread.section_title: EasyJet and BA amongst UK flights in electronic devices ban – Metro
thread.title: EasyJet and BA amongst UK flights in electronic devices ban
thread.title_full: EasyJet and BA amongst UK flights in electronic devices ban

author: tmeyjes
title: EasyJet and BA amongst UK flights in electronic devices ban

organizations.name: turkish airlines pegasus airways atlas-global airlines middle east airlines egyptair royal jordanian

text:
British Airways flights from six countries will be affected by the electronic devices ban (Picture: EPA) EasyJet and British Airways passengers flying to the UK from six counties will be affected by the ban on electronic devices. 
UK ‘to ban laptops and other electronic devices on some flights’ The government confirmed that laptops and other devices could not be included cabin baggage on flights from Turkey, Lebanon, Jordan, Egypt, Tunisia and Saudi Arabia.
The six affected UK carriers are:
British Airways
EasyJet
Jet2.com
Monarch
Thomas Cook
Thomson
The eight overseas airlines subject to the ban are:
Turkish Airlines
Pegasus Airways
Atlas-Global Airlines
Middle East Airlines
Egyptair
Royal Jordanian,
Tunis Air
Saudia
A UK government spokesperson said: ‘Decisions to make changes to our aviation security regime are never taken lightly.
‘We will not hesitate to act in order to maintain the safety of the travelling public and we will work closely with our international partners to minimise any disruption these new measures may cause.’
More to follow.
